name: Food Fortress
description:
Welcome to Food Fortress, an Android-exclusive kingdom builder to promote healthy eating! Build up your kingdom by scanning in your shopping receipts in exchange for construction materials, and prepare for nightly raids by upgrading your town walls. Food Fortress is the perfect game for anyone looking for the motivation to buy healthier foods when they shop.

Please note that the receipt scanning feature in this game relies on a third-party bar-code and QR code scanning application, which is available here:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.zxing.client.android&gl=GB

Please also note that the number of materials you will be awarded when scanning any code will always be eight (8). We plan to change this in the future so that your  awarded materials are calculated based on the items you purchase.

Mechanics

- Scan your shopping receipts (Bar-code or QR code)

- Construct four unique buildings (Cost: 5 materials)

- Upgrade the town walls (Cost: 4 materials)

- Destroy unwanted buildings (Refund: 3 materials)

- Simply exit the game and your progress will save automatically

IMPORTANT - If you are having trouble installing the app on your Android device, your security settings may be blocking apps from unknown sources.
